                                group_means=NULL,
                                ext_vars="sex",ext_effs=list(c(0,-1)),scale_ext=FALSE,
                                net_vars="clustering_local_w",net_effs=list(0.25),net_packages="tnet",scale_net=TRUE,
                                net_cov=TRUE,max_cor=-0.9,
                                mps=0.95,lvps=0.5)
